welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Gross-Zimmern, Germany! Get ready to experience the charm of this quaint town known for its beautiful landscapes and friendly locals. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport, mostly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and oldest terminal at Frankfurt Airport, serving mainly Lufthansa and Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Frankfurt Airport, serving mainly non-Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Under construction and expected to open in 2023, Terminal 3 will serve mainly non-Star Alliance airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also available for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for budget airlines.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Main terminal for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Smaller terminal used for regional and charter flights.
